Data Explorer

Lars Nygaard

2022-07-17

library(trelliscopejs)
library(ggplot2)
library(gapminder)
qplot(year, lifeExp, data = gapminder) +
  xlim(1948, 2011) + ylim(10, 95) + theme_bw() +
  facet_trelliscope(~ country + continent, nrow = 2, ncol = 7, width = 300, path = ".")
